1.0.name: wordpress/better-postviews
1.0.description: This is an efficient plugin which tracks all single-post views. It saves the data as post meta data which can easily be updated if needed. The view count can be seen on the grid on the post screen. The plugin also provides an easy way to get the top post data and use in other plugins or theme files (see below). WordPress high-volume tested.
